abstract: Blippy, a site that allows users to publish their credit card transactions online, has inadvertently revealed credit card numbers of some users.
snippet: Blippy, a site that allows users to publish their credit card transactions online, has inadvertently revealed credit card numbers of some users.
lead_paragraph: 2:59 p.m. | Updated  Added Blippy’s explanation on its Web site of what went wrong.
